features.name: QR Code Generation
features.description: Basic and advanced QR code generation with customization options including colors, patterns, logos, templates, gradients, and effects

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: User registration, login, email verification, password reset, and session management using NextAuth.js

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: User dashboard for managing QR codes, viewing analytics, and accessing account settings

features.name: Dynamic QR Codes
features.description: Dynamic QR codes with editable URLs, expiration dates, scan limits, and real-time analytics tracking

features.name: Analytics and Tracking
features.description: QR code scan analytics with device detection, geographic data, and usage statistics

features.name: API Management
features.description: API key generation, rotation, usage tracking, and REST API endpoints for QR code operations

features.name: Billing and Subscriptions
features.description: Payment processing with Razorpay, subscription management, invoices, and credit system

features.name: Organizations
features.description: Multi-tenant organization management with role-based access control and member invitations

features.name: Custom Domains
features.description: Custom domain setup with DNS verification, SSL management, and vanity URL routing

features.name: Notifications
features.description: Email notifications, notification preferences, and digest emails

features.name: Admin Console
features.description: Admin dashboard for user management, system health monitoring, billing adjustments, and user impersonation

features.name: Webhooks
features.description: Webhook management with reliable event delivery, logging, and outbox pattern

features.name: QR Code Scanner
features.description: Built-in QR code scanner using device camera with real-time detection

features.name: Bulk Operations
features.description: Bulk QR code generation, export, and management

features.name: Image Management
features.description: Logo upload, image optimization, and Supabase storage integration

features.name: Security
features.description: CSRF protection, security headers, rate limiting, audit logging, and API authentication

features.name: Internationalization
features.description: Multi-language support with translation management

features.name: Brand Kit
features.description: Brand kit management for custom branding and styling

features.name: Templates Gallery
features.description: Pre-designed QR code templates for quick generation

features.name: Theme Management
features.description: Dark mode and light mode toggle with system preference detection

features.name: Error Handling
features.description: Error boundaries, error pages, and comprehensive error handling

features.name: Performance Monitoring
features.description: Web vitals tracking, metrics collection, and observability

features.name: Reliability
features.description: Circuit breaker pattern, retry logic with timeout, and background job processing

features.name: SEO
features.description: SEO optimization with sitemap, robots.txt, and meta tags

features.name: Accessibility
features.description: Accessibility features and ARIA labels

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components from shadcn/ui library

features.name: Utilities
features.description: Utility functions for validation, toast notifications, optimistic UI updates, and design tokens

features.name: Navigation
features.description: Main navigation component with authentication state handling

features.name: Onboarding
features.description: User onboarding checklist and guidance

features.name: Loading States
features.description: Loading spinners, skeleton loaders, and empty state components
